S02n209:320: atha māraparṣaddvādaśabimbarāṇi tato'tikramya ita ūrdhvaṃyāvaccaturaśītiṃ yojanasahasrāṇi sphuritvā tādṛśaṃ mārabalaṛddhivegaṃ darśayāmāsuḥ |
S02n209:322: mahākālavāyubhiśca ulkāpātaiśca sumeruṃ parvatarājānaṃ pāṇibhiḥ parājaghnuḥ |
S02n209:325: yato nāgā mahānāgā yato yakṣā mahāyakṣāḥ sarvāvantyā mahāpṛthivyā sagiriśailaparvatāyāḥ sumeruśca parvatarājaḥ kampaṃ viditvā sarasāṃ mahāsarasāṃ nadīkunadīmahānadīnāṃ mahāsamudrāṇāñca saṃkṣobhaṃ jñātvā gaganatale tasthuḥ |
S02n209:326: sā ca māraparṣat sumerumavanīṃ sthitvā yojanapramāṇāṃ vṛṣṭim abhinirmīya aṅgamagadheṣu samutsasarjuḥ |
S02n209:328: atha bhagavān tasmin samaye māramaṇḍalavidhvaṃsanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede |
S02n209:331: yaduta [dharmaśabdaṃ buddhaśa]bdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ pāramitāśabdam abhijñāśabdaṃ bodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇaśabdaṃ yāvatsopā[dānanirupādānaśabdā] nadhyatiṣṭhat |
S02n209:334: anava loka]nataḥ mūrdhnā bhagavān yāvad brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśaṃ vartayāmāsa |
S02n209:335: ekaikasmācca lakṣaṇādbhagavatastādṛśī prabhā niścacāra yayā prabhayā tri[sāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātū]dāreṇābhāsena sphuṭo'bhūt |
S02n209:336: ye cāsyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrayāṃ lokadhātau devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnara-mahoragapretapiśāca-kumābhāṇḍa [manuṣyāmanuṣyā] nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te sarve bhagavantamadrākṣuḥ bahūni ca devanāgayakṣamanuṣyāmanuṣyaśatasahasrāṇi gaganasthāḥ puṣpairavākiran [pra]dakṣiṇaṃ cakruḥ stuvanto namaścakruḥ |
S02n209:337: bahūni nairayikā tairyagyonikā yāmalaukikākṣobhyakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi smṛtiṃ pratilebhire |
S02n209:338: pūrvāvaropitakuśalamūlamanusmṛtya namo buddhāya iti kṛtvā tebhyo'pāyebhyaścyavitvā deveṣūpapannaḥ |
S02n209:339: tataśca mārasainyā dvāviṃśatimāraputraśatasahasrāṇi sapārṣadyāni bhagavata evaṃrūpaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavato'ntike atīva prasādaṃ pratilabdhvā yena bhagavāṃstenopajagmatuḥ |
S02n209:340: upetya taiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhirmārakanyāśatairbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya añjalīn pragṛhya ābhirgāthabhiradhibhāṣante sma |
S02n209:342: vitatya lokaṃ yaśasā vibhāsi tvāmeva nāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ brajāmaḥ ||34 ||
S02n209:379: atha khalu māra[putra māra]kanyāśca sagaṇapārṣadyā bhagavantaṃ muktakusumairabhyavākiran |
S02n209:380: tāni ca bhuktakusumāni bhagavataḥ ṛddhyanubhāvenānekāni koṭīniyutasahasrāṇi gaṅgānadīvālukā[samāni] puṣpacchatrāṇi santiṣṭhante sma |
S02n209:381: tāni nānāpuṣpacchatrāṇi daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mūrdhasandhīnāmuparyantarikṣe tasthuḥ svayaṃ ca tā mārakanyāḥ sagaṇapārṣadyā adrākṣuḥ |
S02n209:382: daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaprameyeṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāṃ pariṣadā parivṛtānāṃ bhāṣatāṃ tapatāṃ virocatāṃ sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ tāni puṣpacchatrāṇi uparyantarikṣe mūrdhasandhau saṃsthitāni |
S02n209:383: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ samavarṇāḥ samaliṅgāḥ samarūpāḥ samadarśanāḥ |
S02n209:384: kevalaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ siṃhāsana-nānātvaṃ pariṣado-[nānātvaṃ] buddhakṣetraguṇavyūha-nānātvaṃ dadṛśuḥ |
S02n209:385: na ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ svaramaṇḍalaṃ [śuśruvuḥ |
S02n209:386: sā] ca māraparṣat bhagavato'nubhāvenaivaṃrūpaṃ prātihārya dṛṣṭvā paramaprītiprasādajātā bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā purato niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
S02n209:387: atha khalu tāni māraputrāṇāṃ sagaṇapārṣadyānāṃ daśabimbarāṇāṃ pratinivartya mārabhavane evaṃ vṛttāntaṃ mārāya pāpīmate vistareṇārocayanti |
S02n209:388: ekaromakūpamapi cāyaṃ tasya śramaṇasya gautamasya na śakto vidhvaṃsayitumiti |
S02n209:389: bhūyaśca viṃśatisahasrāṇi tameva śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ tasyaiva cāgrato niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
S02n209:390: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīmān bhūyasyā mātrayā caṇḍībhūto duḥkhito durmanāḥ vipratisārya evamāha |
S02n209:395: atha māraḥ pāpīmān durmanaskaḥ eva śokā [gāraṃ prāviśat |]
